Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sinister listens carefully to the words of Blizzard.

"Who needs a home, Tw=
ister!? Let's just go find another team that wants us and we shall be on ou=
r way to glory!" Sinesis said to Twister...
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Augus=
t 05, 2000 6:02 AM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


  Blizzard/T=
wister


  *Blizzard begins walking*

  Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I don=
't know what to do, I probably eat myself!

  *Blizzard says sadly*

  Bliz=
zard: It seems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my si=
ster. I know the way she was acting, not normal.

  *Blizzard says to Sinis=
ter and sighs and continues walking*



  *Twister looks at Sinesis*

  Twi=
ster: It was up to me tell the others too but I didn't because I didn't do =
it before I tried to stop Retroflame and I didn't after because I was too c=
oncerned with saving myself....That was the past and the future can be diff=
erent but it isn't looking up now that we have no home...

  *Twister says =
to Sinesis

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
    Subject: =
Re: The End is Near...........


    "Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walke=
d off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.

    Sinesis sighs.
     
=
    "I always said I never made any mistakes. That I was perfect, but once,=
 I was supposed to fight some criminals that had a bounty on them, but I wa=
s not to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal for my own selfish needs,=
 but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could disarm it, but all I did was=
 set the time even lower, and some bots didn't have time to get away. I man=
aged to get away since I knew about it, but I never told them, so that's wh=
y I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had done something evil..." Sines=
is said...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards =

      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 A=
M
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


      Twister/Blizzard


=
      Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame=
. She planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thing because sh=
e claimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners for there were=
 none to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped=
 in a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed not only becau=
se of Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.=
....There were missions before that but I wish not speak of for I have fail=
ed too many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent back =
down for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

      *Twiste=
r says to Sinesis*


      *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frownin=
g*

      Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

      *Blizzard says=
 to Sinister*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE =

        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:=
30 AM
        Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


        Sinesis wal=
ks to Twister.

        "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one=
 of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Siniste=
r shook his head.

        "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Bl=
ender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune =
and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time =
hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always wil=
l be a failure...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: i=
lovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday,=
 August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
          Subject: Re: The End is Near...........
=


          Twister/Blizzard


          *Twister looks at what was left of=
 the base*

          Twister: I always be nothing but a failer with nowher=
e to go...

          *Twister walks next to the pieces of the base sits do=
wn staring at the ground*


          *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs=
 out of her optic*

          Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay tha=
t I can actually call home.....

          *Blizzard lowers her head and si=
ghs*

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
=
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, August 05, =
2000 3:10 AM
            Subject: The End is Near...........


            =
Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and wa=
lked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun arou=
nd and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

            "You=
 do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, =
I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a microsc=
ope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It=
 missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction=
. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to =
her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintis=
sa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa st=
ill avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now=
, after her bad life that she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa=
 beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plinti=
ssa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and s=
liced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hun=
dred times. Plintissa fell.

            "Th weak move aside and die so the=
 strong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way=
 of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but don't take thi=
s personally, it's just business." Dracona said.
             
            =
Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintiss=
a grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracon=
a slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the blade came loose before it=
 hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot=
 had scarred when she first arived on the planet. The blade sawed through D=
racona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last =
words were:

            "*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do n=
ot forget your promise." And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa remembered tha=
t she promised Dracona that she would never leave her sitting. Plintissa cr=
ied. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got weaker and weaker. Artist st=
epped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, too.

            "Artist, I=
'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

            "Why ar=
e you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

 =
           "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part=
, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished=
 spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

            =
"Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my fri=
ends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

            "Your h=
elping days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.
=

            "This isn't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my h=
eart, is it?"

            "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Ar=
tist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, t=
hat it was destroyed by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that o=
riginally built it. And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning=
 away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.

            "Twister, Dracona =
is dead, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to B=
lizzard and sighs.

            "Blizzard, we need to find another home, no=
w." Sinister said sadly.

            Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her =
spark suddenly burst from her and floated into Artist's hands. She said to =
him what he needed to do. He opened his chest compartment and his spark was=
 revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his own, they became one.=


            "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa to=
ld him she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him no=
w, and now they could never be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring=
 Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

   =
         "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa s=
aid. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward th=
e Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attac=
k anyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up=
 the contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

            "I love you." Ar=
tist said seemingly to nobody.

            "I love you too." Plintissa sai=
d to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
